casebody.data:
Weisbrod et al., Appellees, v. Stillman; Cincinnati Insurance Company, Appellant.

[Cite as Weisbrod v. Stillman (1990), 54 Ohio St. 3d 89.]

(No. 89-1803 Submitted August 29, 1990 Decided October 10, 1990.) Richard Paul Michaelson, for appellees. G. Gregory Lewis and Thomas K. McMackin, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on authority of State Farm Mut. Auto. Ins. Co. v. Webb (1990), 54 Ohio St. 3d 61, 562 N.E. 2d 132.

Moyer, C.J., Holmes, Wright and H. Brown, JJ., concur. Sweeney, Douglas and Resnick, JJ., dissent.
